title: Towie star Chloe Lewis welcomes new baby boy with Danny Flasher
text:
Chloe Lewis and boyfriend Danny Flasher announce they’re ‘besotted’ with birth of new baby boy (Pictures: chloelewis91/Instagram)

Towie star Chloe Lewis and boyfriend Danny Flasher just announced the birth of their new baby boy and it’s easy to see why they’re both ‘besotted’ with the new addition.

The 28-year-old reality TV star took to Instagram on Sunday evening to share the happy news.

‘Earlier this week our baby boy arrived,’ Chloe wrote on Instagram. ‘We are completely besotted & so so in LOVE.’

It is not yet known what the name of the adorable new addition to their family is or what specific day he was born.

The pair publicly announced the pregnancy in May and were initially expecting twins.

But tragically, just two months into the pregnancy, Chloe lost one of the twins due to complications.

Finally happy news for Chloe (Picture: Chloe Lewis/Instagram)

She woke up one night to some bleeding, so fearing the worst, the pair rushed to hospital, where they informed her she was carrying twins, but that one of them was no longer alive.

Chloe explained: ‘[The doctor] said she could only see one of the embryos, so it was either behind the other or I had lost it. I told her about the bleeding and she said that I probably had lost it.’

The reality star had to wait three weeks to find out if she had miscarried or not, leaving her in limbo while medical professionals told her ‘not to get my hopes up.’

‘The doctor did confirm the twins had been identical,’ she said. ‘That was so sad for me to hear. I kept thinking this one is going to come out and they would have looked exactly the same.’

She continued: ‘I grieved for about three months. I felt like I had gone into a hole, like I had lost a child.’
